name: Tanks (itch) (thepattybeast)
description:
This game requires JRE 8 or above https://www.java.com/en/download/

Should work on Windows linux and mac(Untested). If it does not work it is most likely because your java is outdated. The version can be determined with the command 'java -version'.

The game mechanics should be explained in the popups that appear in the upper right.

There is an actual game at the end.
